QuestData.Title: Dead Man's Debt
QuestData.Description: You might've heard of Black Conrad, he's a famous pirate around these parts.$B$BWell, he had a thing for gambling on my fights. He had a thing for not paying, too.$B$BI'd love to collect, but trouble is... he's dead.$B$BI was about ready to write the whole thing off, when I came across this...$B$B<Taruk unfolds a map of the Isle of Spears with an X on a northeastern plateau.>$B$BHe hid his treasure on tuskarr land. I want you to get it. I'll be damned if I let that bilge sucker get away without paying.
QuestData.LogDescription: Taruk at Scalawag Point wants you to search for Black Conrad's Treasure on the plateau in the northeastern end of the Isle of Spears, just north of Iskaal.
QuestData.RewardText: I'll take the gold, as it is what Conrad owed me. The rest is for you to keep.$B$BIf you're ever in need of something more permanent, I'm sure I could arrange for something. In the meantime, may the wind blow strong in your sail, friend.
